cause.description:
This is an idea where, we can come together while we are by ourselves, and just enjoy eachothers company doing a whole bunch of nothing as we have a bit of time to relax
1. Your personal time is an absolute must to keep your sanity
2. the faith was meant to be a fellowship of people not a denomination
3. You have to want a better world, society and life
cause.mission: relax, contemplate our life, soul search, pray, find a deeper conection in life, come to peace with ourselves.
cause.name: be a hermit for the pure heck of it
